platform.description: Name of the platform for which the variant is intended, such as WordPress, or Drupal9

structureImplementations.description: Array containing an object for each structure specified in the system to which this variant belongs

name.description: Name of the structure being implemented. MUST correspond with the name of a structure specified within the variant's system

directory.description: Relative path to the folder that will hold all of the assets, components, and files related to the structure

components.description: Array containing objects that describe each component available within the variant

name.description: Name of the component. MUST correspond with the folder name containing the component

structure.description: Name of the structure to which the component belongs. This, along with the name, will determine which folder the component will live in

description.description: Text describing the intended purpose of the component

requiredComponents.description: Array containing the names of all required components

globalDirectories.description: Array containing objects that define each global directory. These directories should files and assets that do not belong in a structure folder (such as font files)

directory.description: Relative path to the directory that will be exported

description.description: Text describing the intended purpose of the folder
